Literature.Title: Targeted and Intracellular Antibacterial Activity against S. agalactiae of the Chimeric Peptides Based on Pheromone and Cell-Penetrating Peptides.
Literature.Author: Li J, Shang L, Lan J, Chou S, Feng X, Shi B, Wang J, Lyu Y, Shan A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:4% Hemolysis=64 µM,Intestinal Porcine Epithelial Cells IPEC-1:30% Killing=64 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:5% Killing=64 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Streptococcus agalactiae CICC 10465(MIC=4µM),Streptococcus agalactiae(MIC=4-8µM),Streptococcus thermophilus YM-C(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>64µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 7469(MIC=>64µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>64µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=>64µM),Escherichia coli 078(MIC=>64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>64µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MIC=>64µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum ATCC 7913(MIC=>64µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>64µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(0-10% Killing=64µM)
